mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT cl.*, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(cl.lastSeen,INTERVAL +9 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS tstime, wl.networkId, jn.tsunix, jn.now_ts FROM bpw_clients cl LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNCATE(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(lastSeen) ,0) AS tsunix, UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AS now_ts, id FROM bpw_clients ) jn ON cl.id = jn.id LEFT JOIN bpw_wireless wl ON wl.serial = cl.recentDeviceSerial and wl.mac = cl.recentDeviceMac WHERE wl.networkId = #{networkId} AND cl.id = #{clientId} ) a WHERE CONVERT(ABS(a.now_ts-a.tsunix),INTEGER) <= #{timespan} ORDER BY a.status desc, a.tstime desc

SELECT gr.t,
gr.application, gr.clientId, SUM(gr.received) AS received, SUM(gr.sent) AS sent FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(tm.alltstime, a.tstime) AS t, tm.alltstime, a.tstime, a.application, a.clientId, a.received, a.sent FROM (
) tm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tr.seq, tr.application, tr.clientId, tr.ts,
tr.t0, tr.t1, CONVERT(ABS(jn.now_ts-jn.tsunix),INTEGER) AS minus, SUM(tr.received) AS received, SUM(tr.sent) AS sent FROM bpw_client_traffic tr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNCATE(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ts) ,0) AS tsunix, UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AS now_ts, seq FROM bpw_client_traffic ) jn ON tr.seq = jn.seq WHERE tr.networkId = #{networkId} AND tr.clientId = #{clientId} AND CONVERT(ABS(jn.now_ts-jn.tsunix),INTEGER) <= #{timespan} AND tr.recentDeviceSerial = #{serial} GROUP BY tr.application, tstime ) a ON tm.alltstime = a.tstime
UNION
SELECT IFNULL(tm.alltstime, a.tstime) AS t, tm.alltstime, a.tstime, a.application, a.clientId, a.received, a.sent FROM (
) tm RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT tr.seq, tr.application, tr.clientId, tr.ts,
tr.t0, tr.t1, CONVERT(ABS(jn.now_ts-jn.tsunix),INTEGER) AS minus, SUM(tr.received) AS received, SUM(tr.sent) AS sent FROM bpw_client_traffic tr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNCATE(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ts) ,0) AS tsunix, UNIX_TIMESTAMP() AS now_ts, seq FROM bpw_client_traffic ) jn ON tr.seq = jn.seq WHERE tr.networkId = #{networkId} AND tr.clientId = #{clientId} AND CONVERT(ABS(jn.now_ts-jn.tsunix),INTEGER) <= #{timespan} AND tr.recentDeviceSerial = #{serial} GROUP BY tr.application, tstime ) a ON tm.alltstime = a.tstime ORDER BY t ) gr GROUP BY gr.t
